name: Melia's Witch Test
description:
* All characters are above 18 years old. *

[Story]
Melia, the witch in training lives in the forest with her teacher. After an accident, she now has to pass the test to become a real witch.
To pass the test, she has to collect magic power to make a magic orb.

Cast the seduction magic to the villagers and take magic power from their cum!


[System]
Talk to NPCs and finish missions.
The test is due in five days. Help the villagers to get magic power from them.
Cast the seduction magic considering how close they are.

There are three endings. (True, Normal, and Bad)
Use the limited resources (Action Token, Magic Power, and Money) to collect magic power to pass the test.
By reaching either ending, all scenes will be unlocked to be watched.

There are some combats, but you don't need to train for it.
